title: Black Friday Sale — Get this refurbished Apple TV for just $69.97
content:
Macworld

Smart TVs are a dime a dozen on Black Friday. But why upgrade when you don’t have to? Instead, convert your existing ‘dumb’ television by adding this refurbished Apple TV. And since it’s offered on Black Friday with huge savings, it’s the way more economical option.

Apple TV is a small, set-top box that turns virtually any television into a smart TV. You just plug it into your television’s HDMI port, connect it to your Wi-Fi, and that’s it. Within moments you’ll be streaming content from all over the web. Plus it comes with a Siri remote so you can control everything from the comfort of your sofa — Even with voice commands.

The particular Apple TV model that’s up for grabs is their 2015 iteration, which has been professionally cleaned and tested to ensure that it works like new. It can play video in 1080p, it offers Dolby Digital Plus 7.1 for impeccable audio, and it has a 32GB capacity which is elite when compared to other similar devices. 

Save $79 when you purchase this refurbished Apple TV with Siri Remote — discounted to $69.97, but only until 11:59 pm on December 3.
